    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-93a0-45c6-2518-f9b85677039f#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Színtanok</string>
            <string language="en">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colourstudies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colourstudies</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Newton, Goethe, Runge színelméletei, Delacroix és Chevreul kontrasztjai és harmóniái. Seurat, Signac, Maxwell és a divizionizmus</string>
            <string language="en">Colour theories of Newton, Goethe, Runge, Contrasts and harmonies of Delacroix and Chevreul. Seurat, Signac Maxwell and the divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">színtan,  Newton,  Goethe,  Delacroix,  Chevreul,  Seurat,  Signac,  Maxwell,  divizionizmus,  </string>
            <string language="en">study of colour, Newton, Goethe, Delacroix, Chevreul, Seurat, Signac, Maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Färben Sie Theorien des Newtons, des Goethe, des
Runge, der Kontraste und der Harmonien von Delacroix und von Chevreul.
Seurat, Signac Maxwell und das divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Colorez les théories de newton, de Goethe, de 
Runge, de contrastes et d'harmonies de Delacroix et de Chevreul. 
Seurat, maxwell de Signac et le divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colora teorias do newton, do Goethe, do Runge, 
dos contrastes e das harmonias de Delacroix e de Chevreul. 
Seurat, maxwell de Signac e o divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colori le teorie del Newton, di Goethe, di Runge, 
di contrasti e di armonie di Delacroix e di Chevreul. Seurat, 
maxwell di Signac ed il divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεωρίες χρώματος Newton, Goethe, Runge, των 
αντιθέσεων και της αρμονίας Delacroix και Chevreul. Seurat, Signac Maxwell και το divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Coloree las teorías del neutonio, de Goethe, de 
Runge, de contrastes y de armonías de Delacroix y de Chevreul. 
Seurat, maxwell de Signac y el divisionism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie der Farbe, Newton, Goethe, Delacroix, Chevreul, 
Seurat, Signac, Maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étude de couleur, newton, Goethe, Delacroix, Chevreul, 
Seurat, Signac, maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudo da cor, newton, Goethe, Delacroix, Chevreul, 
Seurat, Signac, maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">studio su colore, Newton, Goethe, Delacroix, Chevreul, 
Seurat, Signac, maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μελέτη του χρώματος, Newton, Goethe, Delacroix, 
Chevreul, Seurat, Signac, Maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estudio del color, neutonio, Goethe, Delacroix, 
Chevreul, Seurat, Signac, maxwell, divisionism</string>
          </keyword>
